raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Dust Brigade Notum Infusers are used in 15 processes, most of them for upgrading Basic Infused Dust Brigade Bracers. Other 5 tradeskills include Dust Brigade Engineer Pistol upgrade as well as improving 4 gizmos associated with Albtraum. #L "Basic Infused Dust Brigade Bracer" "274541" #L "Dust Brigade Notum Infuser" "274552" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Basic Infused Dust Brigade Bracer = #L "Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 1" "274542" Skills: | CL 2000 | Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 1 = #L "Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 2" "274543" Skills: | CL 2000 | Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 2 = #L "Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 3" "274544" Skills: | CL 2000 | Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 3 = #L "Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 4" "274545" Skills: | CL 2000 | Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 4 = #L "Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 5" "274546" Skills: | CL 2000 | Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 5 = #L "Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 6" "274547" Skills: | CL 2000 | Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 6 = #L "Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 7" "274548" Skills: | CL 2000 | Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 7 = #L "Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 8" "274549" Skills: | CL 2000 | Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 8 = #L "Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 9" "274550" Skills: | CL 2000 | Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Improved Infused Dust Brigade Bracer - Tier 9 = #L "Perfected Infused Dust Brigade Bracer" "274551" Skills: | CL 2000 |
